law.text:
Each person who collects or receives money for the State and who is not subject to § 6-213(a) of this subtitle shall:
pay the money into the State Treasury as provided by law; and
account to the Comptroller for the money:
at the times and in the manner that the law specifies; or
if the law does not specify the time and manner, as the Comptroller considers necessary.
